5GUTLab-\u7c73\u65af/MAKEE-AC17-Verify/A: cmd = "if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then grep sshd /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep 'grep sshd' /home/`logname`/.bash_history | wc -l; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then grep sshd /var/log/secure | wc -l && grep 'grep sshd' /home/`logname`/.bash_history | wc -l; else echo 'Error'; fi fi"
5GUTLab-\u7c73\u65af/MAKEE-AU3-Verify/AU: cmd = "if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then logger 'AU-3 TEST' && grep 'AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `date '+%b.*%d.*%H'`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `hostname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `logname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/syslog | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E -i 'Fail*|Succe*' /var/log/syslog | wc -l; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then logger 'AU-3 TEST' && grep 'AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `date '+%d.*%H'`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `hostname -s`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E `logname`'.*AU-3 TEST' /var/log/messages | tail -1 | wc -l && grep -E -i 'Fail*|Succe*' /var/log/messages | wc -l; else echo 'Error'; fi fi"

5GUTLab-\u7c73\u65af/MAKEE-MA4-Verify/MA: cmd="grep -i sshd.*accept /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep -i sshd.*open /var/log/auth.log | wc -l && grep -i sshd.*close /var/log/auth.log | wc -l\n"
5GUTLab-\u7c73\u65af/MAKEE-CM10-Verify/C: cmd = "if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then apt list --installed; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then rpm -qa; else echo 'Error'; fi fi"
5GUTLab-\u7c73\u65af/MAKEE-SI2-Verify/SI: cmd = "if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d `grep 'upgrade'  /var/log/dpkg.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d \"`grep 'updated'  /var/log/yum.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else echo 'Error'; fi fi"
5GUTLab-\u7c73\u65af/MAKEE-AU11-Verify/A: cmd="date -d \"`stat /var/log/\`ls /var/log/ | grep syslog | tail -n 1\` | grep Modify | awk '{print $2}'`\" +%s\n"
